Class MergedInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.oxcart.streams.MergedInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MergedInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    InputStream that merges multiple other InputStreams.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close the currentStream and all remainingStreams as necessary. If the MergedInputStream was already completely read, then all original streams will have already been closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
